```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
pulse_df <- read_sas("public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% janitor::clean_names()
```


```{r}
pulse_tidy <- 
  pulse_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to = "visit", 
    values_to = "bdi", 
    names_prefix = "bdi_score") %>% 
  mutate( 
    visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m"), 
    visit = factor(visit))
  
```
